notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, G.L.R.; study methodology, G.L.R. and M.I.; samples analysis, G.B.F., P.M., C.V., F.B., S.D.L., and E.S.; analysis, D.B.; statistical analysis, M.B.; comparison clinical/environmental molecular data, A.R.C. and R.B.; writing, G.L.R., E.S., and M.I.; project administration and management, D.D.M., P.S., and S.D. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
